Unnamed: 0: Citadines Connect Hotel Hari Busan Room Reservation Request form
Please complete this form with all requested information and send it to the hotel directly by e-mail.

Please note that your reservation will be finalized only after you receive a confirmation number in response to this Reservation Request Form.
Room reservations will be confirmed on a first-come, first-served basis.
Kindly understand that reservations may not be available in case of limited room inventory due to hotel circumstances.

Unnamed: 1:
*Check-in is available from 3 p.m
*Check-out is by 11:00 a.m

Unnamed: 5: The room type is assigned randomly.

*The breakfast rates are as follows:
-Ages 13 and above: KRW18,700
-Ages 36 months to 12 years:KRW 11,000
-Under 36 months: Free of Charge

Unnamed: 1: * The above all rates are inclusive of government tax.
